title: Pepper and sun-blushed tomato soup

default: ½pint chicken stock (vegetarians can substitute vegetable stock)
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the oil in a medium saucepan and sauté the pepper slices for 3-4 minutes, to soften. Stir in the tomatoes and heat for a further few minutes.
Add the chicken stock, bring to the boil, then reduce the heat and simmer gently for 8-10 minutes.
Stir in the basil and season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
Transfer to a serving bowl and drizzle with a little olive oil, to serve.
